five_ball_attack.probleme: Develop a five-ball attack as a fallback plan

debutant.description: Serve and slow loop to the middle or wide corners
Use opponent's backspin against them; let ball drop slightly, then topspin away with slow loop

exercices_complementaires.description: Serve and slow loop to the middle or wide corners; focus on consistent placement

metriques_progression: Target aggressive shots with each subsequent ball

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Don't force a put-away; play another aggressive shot if possible
